caption: Algorithm 1: Approximate Eigenvector for Streams with no Large Norms
description: This algorithm approximates the top eigenvector of a matrix A in a streaming setting, assuming that there are no rows with unusually large norms. It employs a Gaussian matrix G to perform dimensionality reduction, and iteratively refines an approximation zp using subsampled blocks of A. The algorithm is designed to handle streams with a randomly-ordered sequence of rows.
section: Random-Order Streams with bounds on Norms
